data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Madang, Papua New Guinea.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Madang, Papua New Guinea
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Madang, Papua New Guinea to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 4 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, there are 352,586 people in the state of Madang who claim Christianity, but may have never read the Bible. Please challenge them today to read the Bible for themselves.
data.verse: All Scripture is God-breathed and is useful for teaching, rebuking, correcting and training in righteousness

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Madang, Papua New Guinea.
Please, convict the 113,558 believers in Madang, Papua New Guinea to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Madang with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.section_summary:
the state of Madang, Papua New Guinea has a population of 493,900.

We estimate Madang has 113,558 people who might know Jesus, 352,586 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 27,756 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 4 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Madang, Papua New Guinea.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.
